Installation:
1) Open fsgame.ltx
2) Change the line:
$game_data$ = false| true| $fs_root$| gamedata
to
$game_data$ = true| true| $fs_root$| gamedata
3) Extract the gamedata folder from the zip into the main CoP directory
4) Launch game as usual and enjoy
